---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/cosmos/transfer/get-flow-status-transferred
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://cosmos-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/87c3dd5f-bcbe-7934-92bd-1da47d5aca7e' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `transfer_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "87c3dd5f-bcbe-7934-92bd-1da47d5aca7e",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "from_account_address": "cosmos1u89ikp2v7pr95g0wv2687zleu6v8qjl9qprvzl",
    "to_account_address": "cosmos1vxhllask0nynh20htyfkpkfthy7k3395kz9c4y",
    "amount": "1.0",
    "gas_price": null,
    "gas_limit": null,
    "memo": null,
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "2e69cd5b307af260091f58dee7fe63cbc66da049596ec2fb32234caa8e8e3a98",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "175BF846FBCBD0B59E0DCE77D793A4C38453688B39BDDEA81C14F221892FF071",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "account_number": 721346,
    "sequence": 1,
    "pubkey": "0a2104db33d72ee215f1a61e5f4ffa098b7425cc1da6f5c3627994ad0f21a5ec6fe235"
  },
  "network_code": "cosmos",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-11-16T07:08:33.793Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-11-16T07:54:31.594Z"
}
```

### Token Transfer Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully transferred your ATOM tokens!
